xxl.core.predicates
Class BinaryPredicate<P>

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.predicates.AbstractPredicate<P>
      xxl.core.predicates.BinaryPredicate<P>
Type Parameters:
P - the type of the predicate's parameters.
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, Predicate<P>
Direct Known Subclasses:
And, Or, Xor
public abstract class BinaryPredicate<P>
extends AbstractPredicate<P>

This class provides a higher-order predicate (in other words, this predicate decorates two input predicates). The binary predicate is the basis for every predicate implementing a logical binary operator or the combination of two predicates.

See Also:
Serialized Form
